line.originaltext: In a heavy saucepan, combine the sugar, milk, butter and salt.
In a heavy saucepan, combine the sugar, milk, butter and salt.
Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring constantly.
line.annotation: cook(ing92, t12, ing93, "mezcla caliente", "bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring constantly, for five mins")

line.originaltext: Remove from the heat; stir in remaining ingredients.
line.annotation: combine({ing88, ing89, ing90, ing91, ing93}, ing94, "gotas", "remove from heat and stir vigorously until marshmellows are melted")

line.originaltext: Drop by tablespoonfuls onto waxed paper-lined baking sheets.
Drop by tablespoonfuls onto waxed paper-lined baking sheets.
line.annotation: cook(ing94, t13, ing95, "dropped drops", "drop by tablespoonfuls")

line.originaltext: Let stand at room temperature until cool.
